str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I end, finish, (b) I fulfill, accomplish, (c) I pay. From telos; to end, i.e. Complete, execute, conclude, discharge.
A tax, tribute, especially on persons. From phero; a load, i.e. a tax.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From a derivative of laos and ergon; a public servant, i.e. A functionary in the Temple or Gospel, or a worshipper or benefactor.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To persist, persevere in, continue steadfast in; I wait upon.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
